isInstanceOf

public static boolean isInstanceOf(Class<?> implementingClass,
                                   Collection<?> interfaceClasses)
Check if implementing class is a subclass of any of the interfaceClasses

Parameters:
implementingClass - the name of the class you want to test
interfaceClasses - the classes or interfaces you want to test against (for inheritance from)
Returns:
true if implementingClassName implements one or more of the interfaceClasses

isInstanceOf

public static boolean isInstanceOf(Class<?> implementingClass,
                                   Collection<?> interfaceClasses,
                                   boolean ignoreImplementingClass)
Check if implementing class is a subclass of any of the interfaceClasses

Parameters:
implementingClass - the name of the class you want to test
interfaceClasses - the classes or interfaces you want to test against (for inheritance from)
ignoreImplementingClass - if true, an implementingClass that is also included in the interfaceClasses will be ignored (i.e. will not return true)
Returns:
true if implementingClassName implements one or more of the interfaceClasses
